## Order type

Order of appearance of CSS rules in a sheet. [https://drafts.csswg.org/css-cascade-5/\#cascade-order](https://drafts.csswg.org/css-cascade-5/#cascade-order)

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type Order = number;
```
